name: Combacting Cancer
desc: Creating awareness on Cervical, Breast, Oral and Prostate Cancers with primary screening for detecting abnormalities in oral cavity, cervix and breast (in women) and oral cavity and prostate (in men). Hospital referral for advanced screening and treatment, and follow-ups are done till complete recovery.

name: BioEnergy Healings
desc: The Universal, all-pervading life energy is present within and all around us. The imbalance of this energy in our body physically manifests itself in the form of several diseases, which is why bioenergy therapies help in rooting out the disease from its cause, thus restoring health.

name: Herbs to Health
desc: Our most intimate and direct contact with plants is through food and medicinal herbs. Development of Quality Plant Material, micropropagation of herbs, development of herbal teas and sensitizing young minds about these silent saviours are steps towards harnessing the medicinal value of herbs.
